body: @ryoram : this is actually 3rd title in the continuity. #304602 is also in the same universe, but set 5 years after the Demon King's defeat, and starring the Hero party's Priest. | The Demon of Arsila Caves is amused to know Lenice is the current Hero, which in a way, her junior. She made a deal to return both the Hero and his friends' life, but after they defeated the Demon King, a curse will activate to turn him into a succubus. Officially, the Hero went to hiding after completing his mission. A pair of succubus sister shows up later, and they're rumoured to be even more powerful than the Demon King (and pops up randomly rather than wait in the castle). Officials are still denying their existence (probably still in celebration mood, or to avoid public unrest) while waiting for the next Hero to show up.
Well, I was always wondering if there would be a 2nd part .... now I want a 3rd part

Oh sweet! Didn't think this would get a sequel! (Assumed she would have sucked the Hero dry, instead she did one of my favorite Bad Ends for Male Heroes, "Gender Bender Corruption" YEAH! My second favorite is just "Corruption without the gender bend!" Hope to see the translation soon!
